channel.title: nsq on Travis' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in nsq on Travis' Blog

item.title: Nsq
item.description: official site https://nsq.io/ install git clone https://github.com/nsqio/nsq cd nsq make ./test.sh usage nsqlookupd nsqd --lookupd-tcp-address=127.0.0.1:4160 nsqadmin --lookupd-http-address=127.0.0.1:4161 curl -d 'hello world 1' 'http://127.0.0.1:4151/pub?topic=test' nsq_to_file --topic=test --output-dir=/tmp --lookupd-http-address=127.0.0.1:4161 go https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/czxAuY-CW9v1nBOocYZN5g js python
